title: Wipe Your Feet, Santa Claus!
description: It's Christmas Eve, and Stephen is in trouble. He forgot to wipe his feet again, and has left a trail of muddy footprints across the kitchen floor. Will Santa Claus find out? And if so, will he bring him any presents? Later that night, much to Stephen's surprise, he discovers that sometimes even Santa Claus makes mistakes!
author: Konrad Richter
